availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: H. M. Childs (Catlettsburg, Boyd County, Kentucky, wharf boat driver)

body.p: Catlettsburg, Kentucky, wharf boat driver. Virginia native. Married to Elizabeth Auxier Childs in Boyd County, Kentucky, in April 1865. Driver of a wharf boat in Catlettsburg in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Boyd County, Catlettsburg, p. 814.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Boyd County Marriages, Film #000344011, p. 115.
